alfredsnippet.snippet:
Herbert Dingle, The Scientific Outlook in 1851 and in 1951, The British Journal for the Philosophy of Science, Vol II, August, 1951, No. 6, p.99

"I do not know what model will best represent the world of tomorrow, but I do know that it will coordinate a greater range of experience than that of today."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Dingle on the Future of Science
